resources.string: 2. How to answer the incoming call?

\tIf your screen is turned off, but the device\'s power is not off, press the hold key to turn it on. After that, press and drag the lock to the unlock. If there is nothing, just drag the screen to anywhere. \n\tHere is the simulation video that is one of the ways, when you cannot understand that. In the video, assume that the mouse pointer is one of your fingers. \n\tAnyway, how about trying it out? It works after activating device administrator.

\tThere are many ways to get the incoming call, but I hope you to do that intuitively. When you see the (green or blue) phone shape, try just clicking or dragging it to center. If the shape is white, drag it to green one. \n\tHere is the simulation video of the most common way to get the incoming call. Consider the mouse pointer as one of your fingers like before. \n\tThen, how about asking anyone to call your phone and try to take it? Expecting you to get it! If you did, please check the box!
\tAn application (or App for short) is a program designed to perform activities for the benefit of the user.
\tThe below image is an app icon. To start it, please try to hit it and do not press it for long time.
\tGreat! Many novices used to do \'long click\' when trying to run the app, but you ought to just hit it like just before. Now, can you drag the app and drop it on here?
No, click it for long time this time!
Keep dragging and drop it on the yellow box!
Oh, you missed! Try it again.
\tWhen you see it, you can type in the text on the there. Now, tap on the cursor to pop up the keyboard and type in \'Android\'. After that, please press the done key!
It could be the done key.
Try to manipulate the cursor pointer!
\tPerfect! Let\'s prefix \'My\' to that word. Do not erase the word, just use the cursor pointer. To activate it, tap on it again.
It is named the cursor pointer.
Do not use the Del key now
\tHave you ever scrolled before? You can scroll in the below yellow box. Can you see the bar on the top-right corner in there? It means you can scroll!
\tIf you drag up the box, you can scroll down it. To scroll up, drag down the box. Now, let\'s drag up the yellow box and submit the written sentence in there!
Tap on me and type in here and submit it!
